person.persName: Albert Petty Thompson (Paducah atto & Col. 3rd KY Inf. CSA)

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, attorney and Confederate soldier. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel Thompson and Alice Petty Thompson. Married Mary Jane Bowman Thompson. Married Harriet Harding Thompson. Married Mary Mayes Thompson. Practiced law in Murray, Kentucky, and Paducah. Commonwealth's Attorney for the First Judicial District of Kentucky until 1860. Commissioned Colonel of the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C. S. A.) on October 18, 1861. Killed in battle at Paducah on March 25, 1864.
